text:
STEALING OTHER PEOPLE'S MONEY IS CALLED FRAUD. ALSO CALLED SCAM.

FRAUD #FRAUD FRAUD¬†#SCAM !!!

SHAME ON YOU, Meh Rang youtube Channel .

On 29-8-25 I ordered one article. She said it's available in my size. She gave me her payment instructions. I paid Rs 1,299 and gave my name and address. She wrote to me, "Done".

On 16-9-25 I wrote to her, saying that I have still not received it, and I asked her, "Did you send it? When?"

She replied, "Let me check".

On 17-9-25 I reminded nicely. She read it. No reply.

On 18-9-25 I reminded nicely. She read it. No reply.

On 19-9-25 I wrote to her, that it appears she must have forgotten to dispatch it to me, and my size must be sold out by now, so I asked for refund of my money. Nicely. She read it. No reply.

On 20-9-25 I reminded for refund, and said if I don't get refund by tonight, I will write a truthful review. I wrote politely. She read it. But still..... No reply. She had gone completely silent after 16-9-25.

It is now more than 2 MONTHS  after my order & payment date. But... Article not received. And refund also not received. The Channel owner lady has gone completely silent.

#SHAME ON YOU, Meh Rang youtube channel.

FRAUD #FRAUD #SCAM FRAUD¬†!!!
author: @Factology-pk8kb
